txt.en: Anborn can be found at Henneth Ann没n in North Ithilien.\n\nYou have listened to Anborn's tale and should now ask if he knows more of these travellers.

'I shall not soon forget the night we encountered the Halflings...

'We had caught sight of a fire in the distance, and worried that Orcs were drawing near to Henneth Ann没n.

'Faramir called us to arms and we set out at once...'
Talk to Anborn at Henneth Ann没n
Anborn will not soon forget the doughty little Halflings who gave such cheek to his captain, Faramir.

'After that, I went with Faramir to battle the Haradrim who attempted to pass through Ithilien, while Mablung and Damrod guarded the Halflings.\n\n'When he has the time, Mablung can surely tell you more of this story.'
'Do you still wish to hear my tale, [placeholder]?'
Anborn can be found at Henneth Ann没n in North Ithilien.\n\nAnborn has offered to tell you a tale of strange travellers that passed through Ithilien.
